channel.title: Install_Tomcat :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 部署Tomcat服务 Tomcat官网 8.3.x版本Tomcat安装包 安装Tomcat前准备 创建Tomcat启动用户 $ groupadd myadmin && useradd -g myadmin myadmin $ echo "20210627@123"|passwd --stdin myadmin &>/dev/null $ echo "#########Start/Stop Service############### Cmnd_Alias MYADMIN_START_SERVICES = /etc/init.
